text: im absolutely fascinated by the presence of a lions habitat indoors i recently got to see a lions rear end for the first time while standing beneath the glass ceiling as the majestic animal enjoyed a siesta this is definitely worth checking out  so cool
in case you find it difficult to have fun here it means having an enjoyable time anywhere would be challenging for you
the noise level was quite high but the quality of food was average and didnt live up to the excessive praise
i went to montreal with my friend and the sashimi tasted really bad compared to any allyoucaneat sushi place in toronto i wouldnt recommend it at all so my only advice is to avoid going there

a trip to this establishment takes me on a journey down memory lane reminiscent of the thrift shops of my early years distinctly different from the upscale atmosphere of places like goodwill with an immaculate presentation yet the thrill of hunting for unique items intact they also impress with topnotch customer service and a convenient donation dropoff just inside the entrance

i have a great fondness for the food particularly the lamb kabob and chapli kabob the staff at this place went above and beyond in terms of friendliness and the level of cleanliness was topnotch fresh ingredients were used in every dish and the quantity served was more than satisfying without a doubt i will make it a point to visit this place again

i find it impressive how they have created an indoor environment for lions i witnessed a lions rear end for the first time by standing underneath the glass ceiling as it took a short snooze its really amazing you should see it

expiration dates should be read carefully since ive seen expired items like cheese and eggs still displayed on the shelves they seem to have a tendency to neglect inventory control and restocking with the exception of the excellent service provided by the starbucks staff however its important to remain vigilant when it comes to purchasing produce and refrigerated items

i dont particularly enjoy this establishment perhaps its because they incorporate sweet pickles in their burgers and i wasnt fond of their barbecue sauce i tend to prefer other burger places that offer better value since this one is quite expensive

when i step into this store it evokes memories of thrift stores from my childhood not the expensive ones like goodwill everything is wellorganized but the excitement of finding hidden gems still exists and their customer service is excellent with donation dropoffs conveniently located near the entrance
did you know that stein marts employee handbook does not provide protection for sexual orientation it is important to avoid shopping at a store that doesnt advocate for equal rights

without a doubt this has been one of the most appalling places i have ever set foot in every single high chair lacked functional straps leading to my son repeatedly slipping through them the service was simply horrendous with our waitress managing to mess up part of our order and leaving us waiting endlessly for the bill this establishment is highly discouraged from my end
the store with four exciting levels is a great place to have fun but it certainly comes with a steep price
although it was excessively loud the food was satisfactory yet failed to meet the exaggerated expectations
thai food is something i truly enjoy and this specific establishment is one of my favorites because they also provide delivery services

it could be argued that this is the most outstanding performance i have ever experienced in las vegas it left me utterly speechless and unquestionably justified the cost remember to stay vigilant for ticket sales for tonights show because you wouldnt want to miss out the quality of this diverse spectacle is truly astounding and i am certain we will have the pleasure of enjoying it once more

we went out to eat as a family not long ago and we tried this place while i opted for chow fun my daughter decided on chicken chow mein and my husband ordered the sweet and sour chicken dish regrettably none of us were pleased with the food it was both awfultasting and gave us bellyaches

my burger was exceptionally insipid it simply lacked any sort of flavor previously i never had the need to add salt or pepper to enhance the taste but this particular burger compelled me to do so additionally the special entr√©e offered that day was ribs but unfortunately they were dreadful  reminiscent of eating rubber coated with cold barbecue sauce
the inability to have a good time in this location suggests an absolute incapacity to experience any form of entertainment or satisfaction

was going to grimaldis the right choice that i missed out on

our birthday celebration took a remarkable turn as we indulged in a delightful dinner right from the beginning we were warmly welcomed and escorted to a picturesque window seat the attentive and outgoing staff made our experience even more enjoyable with their impeccable service trust me when i say the surf and turf dish was worth every penny spent and the outstanding clam chowder rivalled that of the east coast this is definitely a place you shouldnt miss out on

indulge in the lively ambiance of this bar with its cold beer great music and flavorful dishes while the cuisine is more on the casual side it is incredibly tasty i personally loved the fish tacos they were simply superb

i am not particularly fond of this establishment perhaps it is because they incorporate sweet pickles in their burgers and i also did not find their barbecue sauce appealing i prefer other burger places for their affordability as this one tends to be pricey
the combination of my love for thai cuisine and my admiration for this eaterys offerings makes me appreciate the fact that they also offer efficient delivery services

during my visit to montreal with a friend we tried some sashimi which paled in comparison to the freshness offered by any sushi allyoucaneat spots in toronto it definitely didnt deserve any stars so my advice is to skip that place altogether

possibly the most incredible show ive witnessed in las vegas it was absolutely mindblowing and definitely worth every penny they are currently selling tickets for tonights performance so make sure to pay close attention this is an extraordinary variety show that exceeded all expectations and i am confident that we will attend it again
its fascinating to see the lions habitat indoors i had my first glimpse of a lions backside when i positioned myself beneath the glass ceiling while it was enjoying a peaceful nap its worth visiting

celebrating a birthday with a nice dinner became an absolute pleasure when we stepped into the restaurant and received a genuinely warm welcome from the staff seated by the window we were able to enjoy the charming view throughout our meal it was refreshing to encounter such friendly and attentive service from all the staff members opting for the surf and turf i can confidently say that it surpassed its price in terms of both taste and quality not to mention i had the pleasure of starting the feast with an exceptional clam chowder reminiscent of the ones ive had on the east coast if youre looking for a delightful dining experience i highly recommend giving this place a try
service was very slow at lunch pizza was ok  have had better pizza at their other locations
thai food holds a special place in my heart and i absolutely adore dining at this establishment that also provides the convenience of home delivery
the bar offers a fantastic combination of cold beer enjoyable music and delicious food while the cuisine may not be overly fancy it still tastes amazing the fish tacos i tried were exceptional
the food has great potential but its disheartening to see it gradually deteriorating

i experienced a highly unsavory burger lacking any distinct flavor surprisingly for the first time ever i found myself sprinkling salt and pepper on it just to bring some taste furthermore the featured dish of the day was ribs and disappointingly they tasted as if i was chewing on rubber accompanied by chilled bbq sauce

the quality of the food at this restaurant is exceptional despite walking past it countless times over the course of a year i only recently decided to step inside to my delight every dish i tried was fantastic the chicken teriyaki skewers and the beef and chicken rice bowl were particularly outstanding when visiting the strip i strongly recommend giving this place a visit
had the az devil hot dog here was ok a bit small of a portion the fries were good will definately try the burgers next time friendly service

as an excellent substitute for starbucks it doesnt offer much variation in terms of taste nevertheless the individual sporting an unconventional ponytail distinct from the owner tends to be somewhat offputting

while taking a break to refuel i came across some rebels in this locality who appeared noticeably less wellkept than those at the ampm store and it was quite evident that the convenience store here lacked a wide range of options

my family and i dined at that establishment recently during our meal i opted for chow fun while my daughter chose chicken chow mein and my husband ordered the sweet and sour chicken dish to be frank i thought the food was dreadful and it actually caused us all to have upset stomachs

i regret to inform you that my recent visit to this venue can only be described as deeply unsatisfactory it saddens me to report that not a single high chair within the premises had functioning straps which led to numerous instances of my son slipping through the openings furthermore the quality of service was nothing short of terrible  the waitress brought part of our order incorrectly and we were subjected to an extensive wait for the bill which ultimately never arrived based on this utterly disappointing experience i strongly discourage anyone from patronizing this establishment again

are you aware that stein marts employee handbook lacks provisions for protecting employees based on their sexual orientation its crucial to refrain from endorsing a store that fails to prioritize equal rights

the food particularly the lamb kabob and chapli kabob is delightful the staff was exceptionally amiable and the establishment was spotless the ingredients were all fresh and the portion sizes were plentiful i will certainly revisit this place
the presence of a lions habitat indoors is incredibly cool i caught sight of a lion resting under the glass ceiling and got a glimpse of its behind its such an exciting experience check it out
price is fine for a 5 foot longbut bread was undercooked thats a firstnnbread was falling apart italian and was not the same quality that im used to

at this bar you can expect a delightful blend of icecold beer splendid music hospitable staff and appetizing comfort food although the menu may not be overly gourmet i must say that their fish tacos are truly outstanding
um its a giant line  and i didnt even have to wait in the line  period
my daughter and her junior high friends loved this place  gotta go with her rating which is top notch

if youre looking for topnotch cuisine look no further for more than a year ive passed by this spot without stopping in but that changed recently to my delight every dish i tried was superb especially the chicken teriyaki skewers and the enticing rice bowl featuring beef and chicken when you find yourself on the strip make sure to add this place to your list of mustvisit destinations

is this establishment regarded as a top choice for a pleasant breakfast experience where you wont encounter generic flavors the portions are quite generous and the prices fair for what you receive in terms of both quality and quantity it may not exceed expectations but the menu is satisfactory albeit with room for improvement

there were no stars so we simply left due to terrible service and a menu that was different from what was advertised online by around 1015 it became clear that the overall experience was not satisfactory they even had to give discounts to all customers before taking orders which seemed dubious i doubt i will ever return to this place

it is advisable to carefully check the expiration dates as i have witnessed instances where expired products such as cheese and eggs were found on the shelves their inventory management and restocking practices seem to be lacking although the starbucks staff are commendable however caution should be exercised when purchasing produce and refrigerated items

my friends and i had a delightful birthday celebration at a restaurant where we received a warm welcome and were seated near the window the staff members were incredibly friendly and the service they provided was outstanding i thoroughly enjoyed a delicious surf and turf dish that was definitely worth its price additionally i couldnt resist starting off with an exquisite clam chowder which reminded me of the ones back on the east coast this experience comes highly recommended

our birthday dinner outing turned out to be fantastic as we entered the restaurant and were warmly greeted by the staff we got lucky with our seating arrangement near the window adding a picturesque touch to our evening all the employees were extremely friendly making the entire dining experience even more enjoyable i decided to indulge in the satisfying surf and turf dish which was undeniably worth every penny and to top it all off i began my meal with a splendid bowl of clam chowder that easily rivaled the taste of those found on the east coast i highly recommend trying this place out

you wont be disappointed by the food at this establishment although ive passed by it every day for over a year without entering i finally gave in and was pleasantly surprised the sheer excellence of each item on their menu left me beyond satisfied the chicken teriyaki skewers and the rice bowl with beef and chicken stood out as especially delectable if you find yourself in the strip make sure to include this place in your culinary exploration
its amazing to witness the lions habitat indoors where i had my first glimpse of a lion from below the glass ceiling as it took a peaceful nap dont miss this incredible sight

i halted at this location to refuel and noticed that both this establishment and other insurgents i observed in the area appeared more rundown than the ampm and undoubtedly had a smaller range of products available in their convenience store

my experience with the american kobe burger was underwhelming to say the least its uneven cooking resulted in a rather dry patty while the abundance of lettuce tomato and onion did little to enhance the flavor despite these shortcomings the burger still carried a hefty price of 17 making it a hardly worthwhile choice
